verses.content: Chun, vântirko hrâttak dang pakhat, sûma inthuom, vâna inthawka hung ṭum ka hmuh a; a lua chun sumrisâng ân zâm a, a hmai chu nisa ang a na, a kehai chu mei ban ang a nih.
A kuta chun lekhabu chîtê phawk sa a chawi a, a ke changtiengin tui- suoriet a sir a, a vawitiengin khaw- muol a sir a;
sakeibaknei inhûk angin rawl inringtakin a khêk tah a. A khêk zo chun vâninrûm pasarihai chun an rawl an insuo tah a.
Chun, vâninrûm pasarihai chun an rawl an insuo phingleh ziek ka tum a; chuongchun, “Vâninrûm pasarihai thu hril chu ip tlat la ziek naw,” tiin vâna inthawkin rawl ka hriet a.
Chun, vântirko tuisuoriet le khawmuola ngîr ka ihmu chun a kut chang tieng vân tieng a phar a,
chatuona hring zing, vân, a chunga thil umhai le hnuoi, a chunga thil umhai le, tuisuoriet, a sûnga thil umhai le siemtu chu sâlin, “Hun um ta naw ni.
nisienlakhawm, vântirko pasari- na rawl ri a um phaleh, a mût ding ṭêpin, Pathien thurûk chu kim tâng a tih, a suok zâwlneihai kuoma a chanchin ṭha hril ang khan,” a tih a.
Chun, vâna inthawka rawl ka ihriet khan a mi biek nâwk a, “Tuisuoriet le khawmuola ngîr vân- tirko kuta lekhabu phar sa saw va la rawh,” a ti ka hriet a.

Chun, vântirko kuoma chun ka va feh a, a kuomah, “Lekhabu chîtê kha mi pe rawh,” ka tih a. Ama chun ka kuomah, “La la, fa zo vawng rawh, chuongchun, i phîng chu sukkhâng a ta, i baua ruok chun khuoizu angin thlum a tih,” a ta.
Chun, vântirko kuta inthawkin lekhabu chîtê chu ka lâk a, ka fâk zo vawng a; chuongchun, ka baua chun khuoizu angin a thlum a; nisien- lakhawm, ka fâk zo phingleh, ka phîng chu a kha zo tah a.
Chun, ka kuomah, “Mi tamtak dâm, hnam tamtak dâm, ṭawng tam- tak dâm, lal tamtak dâm chungchâng thu hril nâwk i tih,” an tih a.
